$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___name.description: The name of the image Template

$eref.description: Identity for the image template.

___type.description: The type of identity used for the image template. The type 'None' will remove any identities from the image template.

___userAssignedIdentities.description: The list of user identities associated with the image template. The user identity dictionary key references will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}'.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.
Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.
Describes the properties of an image template

___distribute.description: The distribution targets where the image output needs to go to.

___buildTimeoutInMinutes.description: Maximum duration to wait while building the image template. Omit or specify 0 to use the default (4 hours).

___vmProfile.description: Describes the virtual machine used to build, customize and capture images

___customize.description: Specifies the properties used to describe the customization steps of the image, like Image source etc

___source.description: Describes a virtual machine image source for building, customizing and distributing

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___properties.description: Describes the properties of an image template

_88ImageTemplateRestartCustomizer.description: Reboots a VM and waits for it to come back online (Windows). Corresponds to Packer windows-restart provisioner

___restartCheckCommand.description: Command to check if restart succeeded [Default: '']

___restartCommand.description: Command to execute the restart [Default: 'shutdown /r /f /t 0 /c "packer restart"']

___restartTimeout.description: Restart timeout specified as a string of magnitude and unit, e.g. '5m' (5 minutes) or '2h' (2 hours) [Default: '5m']

$eref.description: Describes an image source that is an installation ISO. Currently only supports Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.2-7.5 ISO's.

___sourceUri.description: URI to get the ISO image. This URI has to be accessible to the resource provider at the time of the image template creation.

___sha256Checksum.description: SHA256 Checksum of the ISO image.

$eref.description: Describes an image source from [Azure Gallery Images](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/compute/virtualmachineimages).
Describes an image source that is a managed image in customer subscription.

___imageId.description: ARM resource id of the managed image in customer subscription

$eref.description: Describes an image source that is an image version in a shared image gallery.

___imageVersionId.description: ARM resource id of the image version in the shared image gallery

_88ImageTemplateSource.description: Describes a virtual machine image source for building, customizing and distributing

$eref.description: Runs a shell script during the customization phase (Linux). Corresponds to Packer shell provisioner. Exactly one of 'scriptUri' or 'inline' can be specified.

___scriptUri.description: URI of the shell script to be run for customizing. It can be a github link, SAS URI for Azure Storage, etc

___inline.description: Array of shell commands to execute

___sha256Checksum.description: SHA256 checksum of the shell script provided in the scriptUri field

$eref.description: Reboots a VM and waits for it to come back online (Windows). Corresponds to Packer windows-restart provisioner

___restartCheckCommand.description: Command to check if restart succeeded [Default: '']

___restartCommand.description: Command to execute the restart [Default: 'shutdown /r /f /t 0 /c "packer restart"']

___restartTimeout.description: Restart timeout specified as a string of magnitude and unit, e.g. '5m' (5 minutes) or '2h' (2 hours) [Default: '5m']

$eref.description: Runs the specified PowerShell on the VM (Windows). Corresponds to Packer powershell provisioner. Exactly one of 'scriptUri' or 'inline' can be specified.

___validExitCodes.description: Valid exit codes for the PowerShell script. [Default: 0]

___scriptUri.description: URI of the PowerShell script to be run for customizing. It can be a github link, SAS URI for Azure Storage, etc

___runElevated.description: If specified, the PowerShell script will be run with elevated privileges

___inline.description: Array of PowerShell commands to execute

___sha256Checksum.description: SHA256 checksum of the power shell script provided in the scriptUri field above

$eref.description: Uploads files to VMs (Linux, Windows). Corresponds to Packer file provisioner

___destination.description: The absolute path to a file (with nested directory structures already created) where the file (from sourceUri) will be uploaded to in the VM

___sourceUri.description: The URI of the file to be uploaded for customizing the VM. It can be a github link, SAS URI for Azure Storage, etc

___sha256Checksum.description: SHA256 checksum of the file provided in the sourceUri field above

_88ImageTemplateCustomizer.description: Describes a unit of image customization

___name.description: Friendly Name to provide context on what this customization step does

_88ImageTemplateVhdDistributor.description: Distribute via VHD in a storage account.

_88ImageTemplateManagedImageSource.description: Describes an image source that is a managed image in customer subscription.

___imageId.description: ARM resource id of the managed image in customer subscription

_88ImageTemplateFileCustomizer.description: Uploads files to VMs (Linux, Windows). Corresponds to Packer file provisioner

___destination.description: The absolute path to a file (with nested directory structures already created) where the file (from sourceUri) will be uploaded to in the VM

___sourceUri.description: The URI of the file to be uploaded for customizing the VM. It can be a github link, SAS URI for Azure Storage, etc

___sha256Checksum.description: SHA256 checksum of the file provided in the sourceUri field above

_88ImageTemplateSharedImageVersionSource.description: Describes an image source that is an image version in a shared image gallery.

___imageVersionId.description: ARM resource id of the image version in the shared image gallery

_88ImageTemplateShellCustomizer.description: Runs a shell script during the customization phase (Linux). Corresponds to Packer shell provisioner. Exactly one of 'scriptUri' or 'inline' can be specified.

___scriptUri.description: URI of the shell script to be run for customizing. It can be a github link, SAS URI for Azure Storage, etc

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___inline.description: Array of shell commands to execute

___sha256Checksum.description: SHA256 checksum of the shell script provided in the scriptUri field
